H0.text: The invention of what in 1867, made Alfred Nobel famous. Nitroglycerin

H1.text: The invention of what in 1867, made Alfred Nobel famous. Blasting Cap

H2.text: The invention of what in 1867, made Alfred Nobel famous. Detonator

H3.text: The invention of what in 1867, made Alfred Nobel famous. Dynamite

A4.text: Nobel invented dynamite in 1867, a substance easier and safer to handle than the more unstable nitroglycerin. Dynamite was patented in the US and the UK and was used extensively in mining and the building of transport networks internationally.
